tools.title: Runway Gen-2
tools.description: Advanced text-to-video AI that can generate original video content from text prompts. Creates realistic, high-quality video with motion control and scene consistency.
tools.pricing: Free trial, Standard plan starting at $15/month

tools.title: Synthesia
tools.description: AI video creation platform that turns text scripts into videos with realistic virtual presenters. Ideal for training, marketing, and educational content with over 140 AI avatars and 120+ languages.

tools.title: D-ID
tools.description: AI video generation platform that creates talking head videos from text. Features photorealistic digital humans with customizable appearances and voices.

tools.title: HeyGen
tools.description: AI video generator with customizable avatars that creates professional-looking videos from text. Offers voice cloning, multilingual support, and custom avatar creation.

tools.title: Lumen5
tools.description: Video creation platform that transforms text content into engaging videos using AI. Offers templates, stock media, and automated scene creation for marketing content.
tools.pricing: Free tier available, Basic plan at $19/month

tools.title: Descript
tools.description: Video and audio editing platform that allows editing content by manipulating the transcript. Features screen recording, collaborative editing, and AI-powered tools.
tools.pricing: Free tier available, Creator plan at $12/month

tools.title: Fliki
tools.description: Text to video creation platform that generates videos with realistic voiceovers from blog posts, scripts, or other text content. Features 900+ voices in 75+ languages.
tools.pricing: Free tier available, Basic plan at $12/month

tools.title: Pictory
tools.description: Video creation tool that automatically converts long-form text into short videos. Features automatic highlight selection, captioning, and voiceover generation.

tools.title: Elai
tools.description: AI video generation platform that creates videos with digital presenters from text input. Specializes in corporate and educational content with customizable avatars.

tools.title: Nova A.I.
tools.description: Text to animation platform that creates animated explainer videos from text inputs. Features character customization, scene templates, and storyboard generation.

tools.title: VEED.io
tools.description: Online video editor with AI features including subtitle generation, background removal, text-to-speech, and noise reduction. User-friendly interface for all skill levels.
tools.pricing: Free tier available, Basic plan at $18/month

tools.title: InVideo
tools.description: AI-powered video creation platform with thousands of templates, a media library, and automated video generation from text. Suitable for marketing and social media content.
tools.pricing: Free tier available, Business plan at $30/month
